Four Kings () is a Cantonese restaurant in Chinatown, San Francisco. The name is a reference to Hong Kong's Four Heavenly Kings.
Four Kings was named one of the twenty best new restaurants of 2024 by Bon App√©tit. It was added to the Michelin Guide in March 2025.
Founders Franky Ho and Mike Long worked together at Michelin starred Mister Jiu's, which is also based in San Francisco's Chinatown.
